title: This ranch home features large living room
posting_body: This ranch home features large living room, kitchen with newer stainless appliances, granite counters and a breakfast bar.
Formal Dining area with skylight, door wall to private backyard and 3 sided fireplace shared with a large family room which is hard wired in the ceiling for surround sound and newer windows.
Large Master bedroom features jacuzzi tub and separate bath.
Wall was removed from 3rd bedroom to make one large bedroom and can easily be put back up to make a 3rd bedroom.
Main Bath with custom tile floor.
Finished basement with full bath and plenty of storage.
Attached deep garage has staircase to more storage.
Walking distance to Devon-Aire Park & Ice Arena and local historic Wilson's Barn.. call or text
